test.name: Valid Login-Register Success

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'CS KKU' into text field 'id=organization'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Thank you for registering with us.'.
kw.arg: Thank you for registering with us.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'We will send a confirmation to your email soon.'.
kw.arg: We will send a confirmation to your email soon.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Verify Registration Fail
Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id=errors' contains exact text 'Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 081 234 5678, or 081.234.5678'.
The text of element 'id=errors' should have been 'Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 081 234 5678, or 081.234.5678' but it was 'Please enter a valid phone number!!'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.status: The text of element 'id=errors' should have been 'Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 081 234 5678, or 081.234.5678' but it was 'Please enter a valid phone number!!'.

kw.arg: Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 081 234 5678, or 081.234.5678
kw.status: The text of element 'id=errors' should have been 'Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 081 234 5678, or 081.234.5678' but it was 'Please enter a valid phone number!!'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
